query.description: Natural language query used for initial vector search. Ignored if start_k = 0.

edges.description: Metadata fields used to form graph edges.

select_k.description: Number of documents to return. Equivalent to k in most retrievers.

start_k.description: Number of vector search results to use as traversal roots. Set to 0 to disable vector search.

initial_roots.description: Document IDs to start traversal from. Used only if traversal is enabled.

adjacent_k.description: Max number of adjacent nodes considered per traversal step.

max_depth.description: Maximum traversal depth. 0 disables traversal (vector-only behavior).

metadata_filter.description: Optional: restrict traversal to nodes whose metadata matches this filter.
